long description: All Local + STD Mobile Calls @30p/m, 1st 120 sec @2p/s
All Local Idea 2 Idea at @ 10p/min(1st 90 secs at 2p)

Unlimited Local + STD mobile calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 500 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, the pack will be deactivated -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
